RelatedSentence: After retiring from the Navy he worked for New Haven Home in Vista , California , Diversified Sciences Corporation in Palmdale , California and Lockheed Martin in Albuquerque , New Mexico .
Frank is survived by his wife of 49 years , Carol Lowney Wood ; his son , Michael and wife Kimba ; his daughter Sarah and Jim and grandson , Bryce Barrett .
He is also survived by six brothers and four sisters .
